People Power Partnership

People Power Partnership is an online portal that fights for the right of disadvantaged women to own and inherit property, which is a major socio-economic issue in developing countries like India.

People Power Partnership was borne out of my desire to start a grassroots movement focused on helping women reclaim their property and rights. It is a portal which connects organizations who help disadvantaged women and legal networks, so that these women are able to exercise their fundamental right to inherit and own property.

The idea for Project PPP, my most ambitious project to date, came to me in the summer of 2016. Since then, I have reached out to the Delhi Government, numerous commissions for women, concerned government authorities, and multiple NGOs and legal organisations in an attempt to take this cause forward.

The website, which has been completely designed and developed by me, can be seen here.
